name: Wildnet Technologies Pvt.
description: SEO India and SEO Company India
overview:
Wildnet Technologies Pvt. Ltd. Is the leading provider in innovative search engine marketing and optimization services. We differentiate ourselves in our constant ability to keep pace with the changing demands of the industry. Instead of merely laying focus on keywords and conventional SEO tactics we also lay emphasis on highly structured content that is based on the theme and concept of your website.

We offer a plethora of services spanning:

  • SEO Services
  • Link Building
  • PPC Services
  • Website Design India
  • Web Development India
  • Social Media Optimization

Our Goal

Our mission is to provide your website with the best placement in terms of search engine page rankings. All of methodologies are 100% ethical and we make sure to never use any malpractices in our SEO efforts. Therefore you can be rest assured of high quality and satisfaction when you leverage our services. We believe in the four pillars of Speed, Quality, Choice & Security which eventually has turned out to be our USP as well.

Our Expertise

Wildnet Technologies Pvt. Ltd. was founded in 2005 and since then we have gained consistent revenue growth every year. We are an ISO 9001:2000 certified, Google Adwords Qualified Professional company with an employee base of 300 people. We are quality-oriented people and believe in building long term business relationships.

Clients

Our clients include Fortune 200 companies such as Microsoft, Virgin Mobile, Fidelity, Choclate.com, Intelex, Total Med India, Crystal Travel UK, Mermaid Designs and many others. We have more than 350 current clients and have successfully completed over 700 plus projects. Thus we are well positioned to be your trusted partner to get you the best search engine page rankings possible.
